"Shirayuki": "Aye. That desire to improve is worthy of respect."
"Presently, there isn't a single person in this camp who doesn't know of your abilities."
"So we've been curious... How much more room do you have for improvement?"
"For example, what if you were to push a Class to its extreme?"
"I want to see you surpass your limits."
